entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
